Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Naamaththaikkuriththu Saalomonukku Undaayirundha Keerththi Sebaavin Raajasthreekkuk Kelviyaanapodhu, Aval Vidukadhaigalinaal Avanai Sodhikkiradharkaaga,

2 migundha Parivaaraththodum, Kandhavarkkangalaiyum, Migudhiyaana Ponnaiyum Raththinangalaiyum Sumakkira Ottagangalodum, Erusalemukku Vandhaal; Aval Saalomonidaththil Vandhapodhu, Than Manadhil Irundha Ellaavatraiyunkuriththu Avanidaththil Sambaashiththaal.
3 appozhudhu Saalomon Aval Kettavaigalaiyellaam Viduviththaan, Avalukku Viduvikkak Koodaadhapadikku, Ondraagilum Raajaavukku Maraiporulaayirukkavillai.
4 sebaavin Raajasthree Saalomonudaiya Sagala Gnaanaththaiyum, Avan Kattina Aramanaiyaiyum,

5 avan Pandhiyin Pojanapadhaarththangalaiyum, Avan Oozhiyakkaararin Veedugalaiyum, Avan Uththiyogastharin Varisaiyaiyum, Avargal Vasthirangalaiyum, Avanudaiya Paanapaaththirakkaararaiyum, Avan Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkul Pravesikkum Nadaimandabaththaiyum Kandapodhu Aval Aachchariyaththaal Bramaikondu,
6 raajaavai Nokki: Ummudaiya Varththamaanangalaiyum Ummudaiya Gnaanaththaiyum Kuriththu Naan En Dhesaththil Ketta Seydhi Meyyaayitru.

7 naan Vandhu Adhai En Kangalaal Kaanumattum Andha Vaarththaigalai Naan Nambavillai; Ivaigalil Paadhiyaagilum Enakku Arivikkappadavillai Endru Kaangiren; Naan Kelvippatta Prasthaabaththaippaarkkilum, Ummudaiya Gnaanamum Selvamum Adhigamaayirukkiradhu.
8 ummudaiya Janangal Baakkiyavaangal; Eppodhum Umakku Munbaaga Nindru, Ummudaiya Gnaanaththaik Ketkira Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararum Baakkiyavaangal.

9 ummai Isravelin Singaasanaththinmel Vaikka, Ummel Piriyankonda Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sthoththirikkappaduvaaraaga: Karththar Isravelai Endraikkum Snegikkirapadiyinaal, Nyaayamum Needhiyum Seygiradharku Ummai Raajaavaaga Erpaduththinaar Endraal.

10 aval Raajaavukku Nootrirubadhu Thaalandhu Ponnaiyum, Migudhiyaana Kandhavarkkangalaiyum, Raththinangalaiyum Koduththaal; Sebaavin Raajasthree Raajaavaagiya Saalomonukkuk Koduththa Avvalavu Kandhavarkkangal Pirpaadu Orukkaalum Varavillai.
11 oppeerilirundhu Ponnaik Konduvarugira Eeraamin Kappalgalum, Oppeerilirundhu Migundha Vaasanai Marangalaiyum Raththinangalaiyum Konduvandhadhu.

12 andha Vaasanai Marangalaal Raajaa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkum Raaja Aramanaikkum Oondrukaalgalaiyum, Sangeedhakkaararukku Suramandalangalaiyum, Thamburugalaiyum Undaakkinaan; Appadippatta Vaasanaimarangal Pirpaadu Vandhadhumillai, Innaalvaraikkum Kaanappadavumillai.

13 raajaavaagiya Saalomon Thaane Sandhoshamaai Sebaavin Raajasthreekku Vegumadhigal Koduththadhum Allaamal, Aval Viruppappattuk Kettadhu Ellaavatraiyum Avalukkuk Koduththaan; Pinbu Aval Than Parivaaraththode Than Dhesaththirkuth Thirumbip Ponaal.
14 saalomonukku Vyaabaarigalaalum, Sugandha Thiraviya Varththagaraalum, Arabidhesaththu Sagala Raajaakkalaalum, Maagaanangalin Adhipadhigalaalum Vandha Ponnaiyallaamal,
15 ovvoru Varushaththil Avanukku Vandha Pon Arunootru Arubaththaaru Thaalandhu Niraiyaayirundhadhu.
16 saalomon Raajaa, Adiththa Pon Thagattaal Irunooru Parisaigalai Seyviththaan; Ovvoru Parisaikku Arunooru Sekkal Niraipon Sendradhu.
17 adiththa Pon Thagattaal Munnooru Kedagangalaiyum Seyviththaan; Ovvoru Kedagaththirku Moondru Raaththal Pon Sendradhu; Avaigalai Raajaa Leebanon Vanam Ennum Maaligaiyile Vaiththaan.
18 raajaa Thandhaththinaal Periya Oru Singaasanaththaiyum Seyviththu, Adhaip Pasumpon Thagattaal Moodinaan.

19 andha Singaasanaththirku Aaru Padigal Irundhadhu; Singaasanaththin Thalaippu Pinnaaga Valaivaayirundhadhu; Utkaarum Idaththirku Irupuramum Kaichchaaimaanangal Irundhadhu; Irandu Singangal Kai Saaimaanangal Aruge Nindradhu.
20 aaru Padigalinmelum, Irandu Pakkaththilum, Pannirandu Singangal Nindradhu; Endha Raajyaththilum Ippadip Pannappadavillai.

21 raajaavaagiya Saalomonukku Irundha Paanapaaththirangalellaam Ponnum, Leebanon Vanam Engira Maaligaiyin Panimuttugalellaam Pasumponnumaayirundhadhu; Ondrum Velliyinaal Seyyappadavillai; Saalomonin Naatkalil Velli Oru Porulaai Ennappadavillai.

22 raajaavukku Samuththiraththile Eeraamin Kappalgalodekoodath Tharsheesin Kappalgalum Irundhadhu; Tharsheesin Kappalgal Moondru Varushaththukku Orudharam Ponnaiyum, Velliyaiyum, Yaanaiththandhangalaiyum, Kurangugalaiyum, Mayilgalaiyum Konduvarum.
23 boomiyin Sagala Raajaakkalaippaarkkilum, Raajaavaagiya Saalomon Aisuvariyaththilum Gnaanaththilum Sirandhavanaayirundhaan.
24 saalomonin Irudhayaththile Dhevan Aruliya Gnaanaththaik Ketkiradharkaaga, Sagala Dhesaththaarum Avan Mugadharisanaththaith Thedinaargal.

25 varushaavarusham Avaravar Thangal Kaanikkaiyaagiya Vellippaaththirangalaiyum, Porpaaththirangalaiyum, Vasthirangalaiyum, Aayudhangalaiyum, Kandhavarkkangalaiyum, Kudhiraigalaiyum, Koveru Kazhudhaigalaiyum Konduvaruvaargal.

26 saalomon Radhangalaiyum Kudhiraiveeraraiyum Serththaan; Avanukku Aayiraththu Naanooru Radhangal Irundhadhu, Panneeraayiram Kudhiraiveerarum Irundhaargal; Avaigalai Radhangal Vaikkum Pattanangalilum,avargalai Erusalemil Thannidaththilum Vaiththirundhaan.
27 erusalemile Raajaa Velliyaik Karkalpolavum, Kedhurumarangalaip Pallaththaakkugalil Irukkum Kaattaththimarangalpolavum Adhigamaakkinaan.
28 saalomon Thanakkuk Kudhiraigalaiyum Pudavaigalaiyum Egipthilirundhu Azhaippiththaan; Raajaavin Varththagar Pudavaigalai Oppandha Vilaikkirayaththirku Vaanginaargal.

29 egipthilirundhu Vandha Ovvoru Radhaththin Vilai Arunooru Vellikkaasum, Ovvoru Kudhiraiyin Vilai Nootraimbadhu Vellik Kaasumaayirundhadhu; Indhappragaaram Eththiyarin Raajaakkalellaarukkum, Seeriyaavin Raajaakkalukkum Avargal Mo
